casebody.data:
Mary CLEM, as Personal Representative of the ESTATE OF Robert E. CLEM, Jr., deceased, and Mary Clem, individually, Appellants-Plaintiffs,
v.
Richard K. FREEMAN, M.D., and St. Vincent Medical Group, Inc., Appellees-Defendants. Court of Appeals Case No. 29A02-1703-PL-714 Court of Appeals of Indiana. September 12, 2017

DISPOSITION OF CASE BY UNPUBLISHED MEMORANDUM DECISION

BRADFORD , J.

Reversed.

MAY, J., Concurs.

BARNES, J., Concurs.
